job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant business discipline from an accredited four-year college or university.

jd: Job Description -­Need local or nearby candidates with LinkedIn with actual genuine visa Senior Oracle PL/SQL DeveloperClient – NRG Energy6 months+Locations: - : 3 days onsite a week- Houston, TXSkype***Must be local to Houston or TX and be willing to come into the downtown office Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday of every week***Design, develop, test, maintain, and support batch applications using Oracle PL/SQL for Retail Commissions and Amortization.Education:Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant business discipline from an accredited four-year college or university.Experience:15+ years of experience in Software development12+ years of strong development experience using Oracle PL/SQL including experience using features like Analytical functions, merge statements, WITH clause, oracle partitioning, job logging, exception handling, performance tuning12+ years of experience in Oracle 12c or 19c5+ years of experience in a Data Warehouse environmentStrong Analytical skillsTroubleshooting skillsStrong Team Player Additional skills:Flexibility, Dedication, Consistency, Integrity, and Enthusiasm a must.
